text: Thomas Lauren Friedman (born July 20, 1953) is an American journalist. Friedman is known for supporting a compromise resolution to the Israeli- Palestinian conflict, modernization of the Arab world, environmentalism and globalization. Although an early supporter of the invasion of Iraq, he later became an outspoken critic of the war and the Bush administration. Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:American columnists Category:Journalists from Minnesota
title: Thomas Friedman
